column5: Was hoping to get down to Lake O in the next few days and I was wondering if anyone could give me some direction on depths to fish and what type of lures to pull.  thanks in advance  Ryan
Start in 60 fow, meander your way out looking for baitfish. For spoons, try wonderbread, MILTF or blue easter egg. You can never go wrong with a chartreuse flasher - fly combo as well.  Tightlines!
